regular-title: In which kittens' awesomeness is incorrectly questioned
regular-body:
kittensandscience:

I wish I were a good person. An actual good person, not just someone with âgood intentionsâ. Someone who actually has a positive impact instead of just wasting space and being a burden to everyone. Someone likeable. Someone with actual goddamn social skills. Someone who can hold an actual conversation. But Iâm not

Hey, kittens! I’m really sorry to hear that you’re feeling bad; I just wanted to remind you that (1) you are my FAVOURITE internet-only person, (2) that if your contribution to my Tumblr feed (and so to my daily life) is counted, you have a HUGE positive impact, and (3) you are absolutely, totally, eminently a likeable person. It sucks that you’re not feeling like it right now, but I’m here to remind you that it’s true. Take care, and if I can help in ANY WAY, please let me know. I hope you feel better soon!
